title: The S Manager’s Shameful Lessons - Novel Updates
author: Sakurazaka Yukari   櫻坂ゆかり
description:
Office Lady Riko ruined some important work data. She confesses to her boss, Fujisaki, who traps her in a deal, in exchange for taking the fall for her mistake.
Sleep with him for a month.

Will Riko be able to extricate her body and heart from him at the end of the month?>
